From: Jered Isaacman <jisaacman id="F7lDp9ZmEU" data-rand="W8YdkMSruF"@shift4.com>

Subject: Shift4 Payments Announces Exclusive Partnership with CardConnect

[CardConnect Logo]

FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE

SHIFT4 PAYMENTS ANNOUNCES EXCLUSIVE PARTNERSHIP WITH
CARDCONNECT

ALLENTOWN, Pa. & KING OF PRUSSIA, Pa. --- Sept. 11, 2019 --- Shift4 Payments, the
leader in secure payment processing solutions, today announced an exclusive partnership with
CardConnect, a First Data company and a leading provider of payment processing and technology
solutions, to deliver an unmatched payment solution for merchants of every type and size.

This partnership combines Shift4's industry-leading, innovative payment technologies with the
powerful payment processing capabilities of CardConnect.

CardConnect will serve as the exclusive payment processor for new merchant accounts boarded by
Shift4 Payments. CardConnect's unparalleled merchant onboarding, underwriting and risk
management proficiencies will provide an expedited and seamless merchant onboarding experience
with the highest level of account approvals in the industry.

Shift4 will continue to deliver the full breadth of their advanced value-added services, including
secure payment processing for hundreds of software integrations, a robust merchant management system,
and the most reliable payment gateway in the industry.

This partnership also complements Shift4's rapidly growing software-as-a-service business.
Through their unique SaaS program, software companies can bundle their software offering with
payment services as a single, fully integrated solution. This delivers industry leading economics to
software companies while eliminating the complexities, costs and risks associated with managing
payments on their own.

"We are thrilled to enter into this strategic partnership with CardConnect," said Jared Isaacman,
CEO of Shift4 Payments. "This partnership is beneficial for all parties involved, including the
merchants we service. We are confident that by combining our innovative technologies with
CardConnect's processing platform, we have created a truly unmatched solution for merchants and
software providers."

"We are excited about the opportunities this partnership brings," said Abe W. Gordon, Fiserv
Group President, Card Services. "We have had a longstanding, beneficial relationship with
Shift4 and look forward to strengthening our position as partners in delivering best-in-class
solutions to our clients."

About Shift4 Payments
Shift4 Payments is the leader in secure payment processing solutions, powering the top
software providers across numerous verticals, including hospitality, retail, food & beverage,
e-commerce, lodging, gaming, and more. With over 200,000 merchants, the company
securely processes more than 3.5 billion transactions annually, exceeding $200 billion in
payments each year. For additional information, visit shift4.com.

About CardConnect
CardConnect, a Fiserv company, is a leading provider of payment processing and
technology solutions, helping more than 195,000 merchants accept billions of dollars in
card transactions each year. Since its inception in 2006, CardConnect has developed
advanced payment solutions backed by patented, PCI-validated point-to-point encryption
(P2PE) and tokenization. The company's small-to-midsize business offering,
CardPointe, is a comprehensive platform that includes a powerful reporting and
transaction management portal which extends to a native mobile app. For enterprise-level
organizations, CardSecure integrates omni-channel payment acceptance into several
ERP systems - such as Oracle, SAP, JD Edwards and Infor M3 - in a way that
minimizes PCI compliance requirements and lowers transaction costs.

[Shift4 Payments Logo]
